articles.title: Olympic champion Jacobs withdraws from Eugene Diamond League meet
articles.description: Italy's double Olympic champion Lamont Marcell Jacobs has withdrawn from this weekend's Diamond League meeting in Eugene, Oregon, due to a muscle injury, Italy's athletics federation (FIDAL) said.
